sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
A mụrụ Stephanie Clifford n'afọ 1979 na Louisiana steeti nke mba Amerịka.
Aha ejije ya bụ Stormy Daniels bụ nke o kwuru ọ chepụtara site n'ịgwọkọ aha nwaanyị onyo ọkpọ ụbọ Nikki Sixx bụ Storm nakwa aha mmanya na-aba n'anya a ma ama mba Amerịka bụ Jack Daniels.
Ọ malitere ịrụ n'ụlọọrụ ebe a na-eme ejije aramara dịka onye ọ mee ejije mana n'afọ 2004 ọ malitere dewee akwụkwọ ejije aramara ma mepụtawa ejije aramara nke ya.
Ị kwekwaraike ime ihu ya n'ejije Hollywood nkịtị ndị ọzọ dịka 'The 40 Year Old Virgin' na 'Slightly Pregnant' nakwa n'ihe onyonyo egwu a ma ama nke otu Maroon Five gụrụ bụ 'Wake up call'.
Daniels nwabukwara ịzọ ọkwa sịnetọ n'afọ 2010 mana meecha kagbuo atụmatụ ahụ n'ihi o kwuru ndị mmadụ ji ya na atụmatụ egwu egwu.
Kedụ ebubo a na-ebo Trump metụtara Daniels?
Trump na Daniels zutere onwe ha n'afọ 2006.
Daniels kwuru na o zutere Trump mbụ n'emume egwuregwu Golf e mere na Lake Tahoe bụ ama egwuegwuru nọ etiti California na Nevada.
Trump Under Arrest: Ikpe onye bụbu onyeisiala Amerịka nwerike ịgafe otu afọ5 Eprel 2023
Lee iwu anọ Donald Trump tinyere nke Joe Biden ga-emegharị n'egbughị oge8 Nọvemba 2020
Donald Trump, George Bush... Lee ndị niile chịrị Amerịka naanị otu 'term'8 Nọvemba 2020
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Stormy Daniels: Onye ka nwaanyị a bụ?

Na mkparịtaụkwa ya na ụlọ ntaakụkọ Touch Weekly magazine, nwere na 2011 nke e wepụtara uju ya bụ akụkọ na 2018, Daniels kwuru na Trump kpọrọ ya ha sonye n'emume oriri mana o zitere ya n'ime ụlọ ndịna ya.
Maka izute Trump, Daniels kwuru na mkparịtaụka ahụ na
"O dịna n'elu oche, na-ele igwe TV"
"O yii uwe e ji arahụ ụra."
Daniels boro ebubo na ha abụọ nwere mmekọ n'ime ụlọ ndịna ya mana dịka ndị ọkaiwu Trump siri kwuo, "Ọ jụsiriike na ya bụ ihe e meghi ma ncha."
Ọ bụrụ na ihe Daniels na-ekwu bụ eziokwu, ihe ndị a niile mere afọ anọ ka a mụchara nwa nwoke ikpeazụ ya bụ Barron.
N'onyonyo mkparịtaụka pụtara n'ọnwa Maachị 2018, Daniels kwuru na a majara ya ka ọ ghara ikwupụta ihe a mere n'ọha.
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Donald Trump bụ onyeisla mba Amerịka mbụ a na-akpụpụ ụlọikpe
O boro ebubo na e nwere otu nwoke zutere ya n'ebe a na-echekwa ụgbọala na Lagos Vegas dịka ọ kwetechara na ya ụlọ ntaakụkọ In Touch Weekly ga-enwe mkparịta ụka.
O kwuru na nwoke ha ahụ gwara ka 'ọ hapụ Trump aka'.
Kedụ ihe mere akụkọ a jiri gbaa n'ọha?

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018, ụlọ ntaakụkọ Wall Street Journal bipụtara akụkọ kwuru na ọkaiwu Trump bụ Michael Cohen kwụrụ nwaada Daniels ụgwọ ego $130,000 n'ọnwa Ọktọba 2016 dịka ọ fọrọ otu ọnwa ka e mee ntuliaka mba Amerịka nke Trump onye pati Republican nwetere mmeri na ya.
Ụlọ ntaakụkọ ahụ rụrụ aka na ego ahụ a kwụrụ sọ n'usoro iji ego gbọchie ya bụ nwaada na-eme ejije aramara ọnụ ka ọ ghara ikwupụta ihe ya na Trump mekọrọ n'ọha.
Ego a kwụrụ agaghịbụ ịda iwu mana mgbe Trump kwụghachiri Cohen ụgwọ ego a, e deturu ya dịka ego ụgwọ ọrụ ikpe.
Maka ndị chọrọ ịgba mmadụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara New York, ịgbanwe akwụkwọ e ji zụọ ahịa n'aha ihe na-abụghị ihe e jiri ya zụọ dara iwu.

Ndị na-agba Trump ikpe nwere ike ikwu na ọ dara iwu ntuliaka mba ahụ site n'ịnwa kpuchie ego a kwụrụ Daniels nke a na-ebo ebubo na e ji ya gbọchịe ya ọnụ ka ọ ghara ikwu ihe ya na Trump mere n'ihu ọha.
